/**

convertTime: function (sec) {
  let time
  if (sec > -1) {
    let hour = Math.floor(sec / 3600)
    let min = Math.floor(sec / 60) % 60
    let second = sec % 60
    let day = parseInt(hour / 24)
    hour = hour - 24 * day
    hour = hour < 10 ? `0${hour}` : hour
    time = day < 10 ? `0${day}:${hour}:`: `${day}:${hour}:`
    if (min < 10) {
      time += "0"
    }
    time += min + ":";
    if (second < 10) {
      time += "0"
    }
    time += second
    return time.split(':') // è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«å¤©æ—¶åˆ†ç§’çš„æ•°ç»„
  }
}

    let monthC = diffValue / month
      let weekC = diffValue / (7 * day)
      let dayC = diffValue / day

      if(monthC>= 1){
    result = "" + parseInt(monthC) + "æœˆå‰"

    }

    else if (hourC >= 1) {

    else if (minC >= 1) {

    } else

  const bytes = window.atob(base64Code.split(',')[1])
